IP Fabric | Senior FullStack NodeJS Developer | Prague, CZ | ONSITE

We're making network engineering fun again by mapping and verification of global IP networks, not only by visually mapping life of a packet end to end and all the way down to the electrical signals, but also by guiding engineers through the vast underlying infrastructure technologies. Our product enables enterprises to prevent network downtime or to find the exact cause of that spinning wheel slowness.

We're looking for developers with passion for large scale visualization, databases, api, ui, interpreters, or complex systems.

Our stack

  * Node.JS, ArangoDB, RabbitMQ
  * React, Redux, Socket.io
What we offer

  * Equity through stock option plan
  * Flexible working hours
  * Equipment of your choice
  * Offices in the center of Prague with a lot of light
